attributes.action: Obesity -make it compulsory for restaurants to put caloric information on the menus
attributes.additional_details: When people are unaware of the amount of calories they are consuming then they will overeat especially at restaurants, but if the information is their on the menu clearly people are more likely to watch what the eat. This would be a small step to reduce the obesity epidemic. This has already been put into practice by New York city with great results.
